channel.title: Spatial on owenqi
channel.description: Recent content in Spatial on owenqi

item.title: EDA on Bangladesh Groundwater Arsenic Part 2
item.description: We have perfrom initial EDA on arsenic level in the early post. From the plots in part 1 The region being chosen there doesn’t seem to be much spatial correlation It is hard to interpret this in longitude and latitude In this post, R code for simple data transformation and technique use in part 1 will NOT be shown again, we just present the result. Code for new technique will be included.

item.title: EDA on Bangladesh Groundwater Arsenic Part 1
item.description: This post is a practice note based on tutorials from tutorial 1, tutorial 2 and tutorial 3 towards my thesis, we first perform EDA on data of original scale, once we have idea about our data, we may further perform kriging. Data was downloaded from British Geological Survey as “DPHE/BGS National Hydrochemical Survey”, describing various groundwater quality parameters for several thousand wells measured by the British Geological Survey throughout Bangladesh in 1998-1999.
